column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Uncle , why do you think the dark spirits are following us ? "
#Text=Bolin says : " Can we not talk about dark spirits , please ? "
#Text=Mako says : " My brother does n't like ghost stories . "
#Text=Eska says : " Do n't worry .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Sadly , this is n't a ghost story .
#Text=This is real .
#Text=The spirits are angry because he 's here .
#Text=Have n't you ever wondered how your father ended up in the South Pole ?
#Text=Why he 's never taken you to visit his homeland in the North ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Unalaq , this is not the time .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You 're right .
#Text=You should have told her a long time ago .
#Text=" Korra says : " Told me what !?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I left the North Pole because ... I was banished .
#Text=" Korra says : " You were banished from the North ?
#Text=Why ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Because I almost destroyed the entire tribe .
#Text=Twenty years ago , I was a general in the Northern Water Tribe , sworn to protect my people .
#Text=" Young Unalaq says : " Brother !
#Text=We 're being attacked !
#Text="
